channel.title: What would you do if you were a girl?
channel.description:
What experiments would you do if you were a girl, for like a month. Don't say sex, or then you're gay. Also, if your a girl, then, roflmao, you haz peereeods.
I would get 2L coke, and mentos. Then fill up my temporary vagina, the jump on a trampolene. You know the rest.

item.title: What would you do if you were a girl?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Locked because: Flaming/spamming and all round stupid thread.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do if you were a girl?

item.title: What would you do if you were a girl?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:25, topic:253749”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=335221.msg2613322#msg2613322 date=1230878414]

How are the fu superior and pk4pk still allowed to make topics or even post?
The idiocy behind their posts is mind blowing.

Shut the fuck up. Your most popular boards all have to do with runescape. Chasing a lost cause isn’t something an idiot would do?

worst attempt to flame ive seen today. You just proved his point

No, if i said. ur jest jelos cuz i thot of it first. i’m, sure it would be a lot better.
But in all honesty, there is no reason for him to display such ammounts of faggotry.
[/quote]Such amounts of faggotry? Look at your posts…

Explain how stating they would have sex if they were girls make them gay?

Don’t be surprised when you get flamed and retort how you do, your posts are asking for it.

Maybe I wasn’t clear. When I said being a girl for a month, you would have a mind of a guy. Any normal girl wouldn’t do the stuff a guy would.[/quote]Alright that changes things… Hmm, if I notice a guy trying to hit on me I’d kick them in the nuts.

(obviously not, i honestly don’t know what i’d do)

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do if you were a girl?

ollie is right, you wouldnt know any different so you would be as relatively normal as you could possibly be. However if you had a boys mind and was stuck inside a girls body…
